long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension configures Google Chrome with a New Tab.  The extension name is called
Best Search Engine.  

With the Best Search Engine extension, you can initiate a search on different search engines that were handpicked.  Don't like the results from one of them, then quickly try the next one in the list.

This extension can be uninstalled at any time. 

Google Search is a trademark of Google Inc. The use of the trademark is subject to Googleâ€™s permission. This extension is neither endorsed by or affiliated with Google.
